org.apache.hadoop.hbase.master

接口 ServerListener

  • 所有已知实现类:
    AssignmentManager, RSGroupInfoManagerImpl.FailedOpenUpdaterThread, RSGroupInfoManagerImpl.ServerEventsListenerThread, RSProcedureDispatcher

    @InterfaceAudience.Private
public interface ServerListener
    Get notification of server registration events. The invocations are inline so make sure your implementation is fast or else you'll slow hbase.

    • 方法概要

      所有方法 实例方法 默认方法 
      限定符和类型 方法和说明
      default void serverAdded(ServerName serverName)
      The server has joined the cluster.
      default void serverRemoved(ServerName serverName)
      The server was removed from the cluster.
      default void waiting()
      Started waiting on RegionServers to check-in.

    • 方法详细资料

      • waiting

        default void waiting()
        Started waiting on RegionServers to check-in.

      • serverAdded

        default void serverAdded(ServerName serverName)
        The server has joined the cluster.
        参数:
        serverName - The remote servers name.

      • serverRemoved

        default void serverRemoved(ServerName serverName)
        The server was removed from the cluster.
        参数:
        serverName - The remote servers name.
